title: 30 Minute Mowgli: Fast Easy Indian from the Mowgli Home Kitchen
description: Spice-packed, punchy, and fresh Indian-inspired dishes to get on the table in 30 minutes or less from the creator of Mowgli Indian restaurantsThese punchy and delicious Indian-style recipes will take you from couch to curry in 30 minutes or less. These recipes are big in flavor but also light, healthy and made from accessible ingredients, often just using what's already in your cupboard or fridge. Tantalize your tastebuds with such recipes as “Quick Angry Tandoori,” “Yogurt Coriander Turkey”, “Back of the Fridge Curry” or “Million Dollar Green Dahl.”For super usability, the chapters are themed around • Poultry• Meat• Fish• Vegetables• Desserts• "Ma, Look Away!" (for Nisha's favorite pasta dishes)The recipes range from light lunches to substantial dinners and are all tasty and nutritious meals to whip up without fuss.
author: Nisha Katona
